description:
PURE naturals® proven 16 micron 100% Merino in a 260gm fall/winter weight. Made in Europe. These mountain classics are the perfect base or layered piece for everything from casual use to extreme skiing and mountain missions in the mountains.

Why choose PURE naturals®? Ethical merino ranching in Australia, textile processing by world-famous Schoeller, just down the road from our modern manufacturing partner. 100% superfine (16 micron) merino apparel, made in Europe to our minimal-impact specs. Embrace the PURE naturals® life with sustainable fibers.
name: PURE naturals 100% Merino Wool Full Zip Hoody 260 - Mens
